function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on supply chain and construction industry","Impact":"Severe negative impact on the supply chain and construction industry, leading to longer recovery time","Mitigation":"Implement new strategies to avoid travail of humankind, subsidize affected sectors, plan for recovery","Technologies":"Remote communication tools (e.g., Skype) for conducting interviews during lockdown","People":"Construction industry workers, supply chain workers, experts","Owner":"Government, construction industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Lack of exclusive study on the impact of COVID-19 on the construction industry","Impact":"Limited understanding of the effects of the pandemic on the construction industry","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies to discover the effects of the pandemic on the construction industry","Technologies":"Data collection methods, remote survey tools","People":"Researchers, construction industry experts","Owner":"Research institutions, construction industry organizations"}]}
